Module uk.ac.soton.comp1206
Package uk.ac.soton.comp1206.game

Class Game

java.lang.Object
uk.ac.soton.comp1206.game.Game
public class Game extends Object
The Game class handles the main logic, state and properties of the TetrECS game. Methods to manipulate the game state and to handle actions made by the player should take place inside this class.

      public Game(int cols, int rows)
      Create a new game with the specified rows and columns. Creates a corresponding grid model.

      rows - number of rows
